titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2586) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2002 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-218, by Mrs. Myrick.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2586. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 246.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/24/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2586 (FY 2002 Department of Defense funding authorization).
